    152                                              
    153                                              // tx modes parameters 
    154                                              parameter [3:0]  
    155                                                              zero                   = 4'd6  ,  //                        
    156                                                              one                    = 4'd2  ,  //                        
    157                                                              special_preamble       = 4'd0  ,  // 01 of cmd word          
    158                                                              seven_zeros            = 4'd3  ,  // 7'b 0000_000            
    159                                                              serializing_address    = 4'd1  ,  // serializing 7 bits + 1 bit ParAdj      
    160                                                              serializing_byte_port  = 4'd5  ,  // serializing 8 bits that given from CCC to tx not from regfile to tx 
    161                                                              serializing_byte_regf  = 4'd7  ,  //                         
    162                                                              parity_calc            = 4'd4  ,  //                        
    163                                                              c_token_CRC            = 4'd12 ,  // 4'hC                    
    164                                                              value_CRC              = 4'd13 ,  // 5 bit value             
    165                                                              restart_pattern        = 4'd15 ,  //                         
    166                                                              exit_pattern           = 4'd14 ;  //                         
    167                                                              
    168                                              
    169                                              // regfile parameters 
    170                                              parameter [11:0] first_location = 12'd1000 ;
    171                                              
    172                                              // rx parameters 
    173                                              parameter [3:0] 
    174                                                               preamble_rx_mode    = 4'd0 , 
    175                                                               CRC_PREAMBLE        = 4'd1 ,
    176                                                               parity_check        = 4'd6 ,
    177                                                               deserializing_byte  = 4'd3 ,
    178                                                               check_c_token_CRC   = 4'd5 ,
    179                                                               check_value_CRC     = 4'd7 ;
    180                                              
    181                                              
    182                                              // SCL staller parameters 
    183                                              parameter [4:0] restart_pattern_stall = 5'd11  , // according to restart pattern specs 
    184                                                              restart_pattern_stall_special = 5'd11  , // according to restart pattern specs
    185                                                              exit_pattern_stall    = 5'd17 ; // according to exit pattern specs 
    186                                              
    187                                              
    188                                              // Error states parameters 
    189                                              parameter [3:0] 
    190                                                              SUCCESS     = 4'h0  ,
    191                                                              CRC_ERR     = 4'h1  ,
    192                                                              PARITY_ERR  = 4'h2  ,
    193                                                              FRAME       = 4'h3  ,
    194                                                              ADDR_HEADER = 4'h4  ,
    195                                                              NACK        = 4'h5  ,
    196                                                              OVL         = 4'h6  ,
    197                                                              SRE         = 4'h7  ,
    198                                                              C_ABORTED   = 4'h8  ,
    199                                                              T_ABORTED   = 4'h9  ;
    200                                              // CCC values 
    201                                              parameter [7:0] 
    202                                                              ENEC_D      = 8'h80 ,   
    203                                                              DISEC_D     = 8'h81 , 
    204                                                              SETMWL_D    = 8'h89 ,
    205                                                              SETMRL_D    = 8'h8A ,
    206                                                              GETMWL_D    = 8'h8B ,
    207                                                              GETMRL_D    = 8'h8C ,
    208                                                              GETSTATUS_D = 8'h90 ,
    209                                                              GETPID_D    = 8'h8D ,
    210                                                              GETBCR_D    = 8'h8E ,
    211                                                              GETDCR_D    = 8'h8F ,
    212                                                              ENEC_B      = 8'h00 ,
    213                                                              DISEC_B     = 8'h01 ,
    214                                                              SETMWL_B    = 8'h09 ,
    215                                                              SETMRL_B    = 8'h0A ,
    216                                                              Dummy_B     = 8'h1F ;
    217                                              
    218                                              
    219             1                      53208     always @(*) begin 
    220             1                      53208         o_frmcnt_Direct_Broadcast_n = Direct_Broadcast_n ;
    221                                              end 
    222                                              
    223                                              //o_en_mux = (first_time)? 1 : (i_regf_RnW)?  0 : 1 ;
    224                                              
    225             1                     248034     always @(*) begin 
    226             1                     148034         if (first_time)         o_en_mux = 1'b1 ;
    227             1                      60007         else if (!i_regf_RnW)   o_en_mux = 1'b1 ;
    228             1                      39993         else                    o_en_mux = 1'b0 ;
    229                                              end
    230                                              
    231                                              /////////////////////////// decoding the device address  ///////////////////////////////////////
    232                                              
    233             1                      96702     assign target_addres = i_regf_DEV_INDEX + 'd8 ;
    234                                              /*
    235                                              localparam [3:0] no_of_unq_ccc_sup = 4'd9 ;
    236

    238                                                               CCC_value_lo      = 7'd56 ,

    250                                                               Data_five_lo      = 7'd8  ,
    251                                                               Data_six_hi       = 7'd7  ,
    252                                                               Data_six_lo       = 7'd0  ;
    253                                              
    254                                                  generate 
    255                                                      genvar i ;
    256                                                      for (i = 0 ; i < i_no_of_targets ; i = i + 1) begin
    257                                                          reg [63:0] CCC_Table [no_of_unq_ccc_sup:0][i] ;
    258                                                      end 
    259                                                  endgenerate
    260                                              
    261                                              */
    262                                              
    263                                              
    264                                              //////////////////////////////////////// Direct or Broadcat detection  ///////////////////////////////////////////////
    265                                              
    266                                              // we have 16 required CCC to support at ground level 
    267                                              
    268                                              // to determine whether it's a Direct or Broadcast 
    269             1                     138651         always @(*) begin 
    270                                                      case (i_regf_CMD) 
    271             1                       8821                 8'h80 : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // ENEC     
    272             1                       9360                 8'h81 : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // DISEC       
    273             1                       6270                 8'h89 : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // SETMWL        
    274             1                       8992                 8'h8A : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // SETMRL        
    275             1                       9386                 8'h8B : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // GETMWL          
    276             1                       8736                 8'h8C : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // GETMRL        
    277             1                       6241                 8'h90 : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // GETSTATUS  
    278             1                       9179                 8'h8D : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // GETPID       
    279             1                       8914                 8'h8E : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // GETBCR        
    280             1                       9356                 8'h8F : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b1 ;   // GETDCR      
    281                                              
    282             1                       8936                 8'h00 : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b0 ;   // ENEC      (broadcast version)
    283             1                       9403                 8'h01 : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b0 ;   // DISEC     (broadcast version)
    284             1                       6103                 8'h09 : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b0 ;   // SETMWL    (broadcast version)
    285             1                       6286                 8'h0A : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b0 ;   // SETMRL    (broadcast version)
    286                                                         
    287                                              
    288             1                       6174                 8'h1F : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b0 ;    // Dummy CCC value for end procedure
    289             1                      16494                 default : Direct_Broadcast_n = 1'b0 ;  // broadcast by default
    290                                                      endcase
    291                                                  end
    292                                              
    293             1                    1053430      always @ (posedge i_sys_clk or negedge i_sys_rst) begin 
    294                                                  if (!i_sys_rst) begin
    295             1                          2             tmp_shift <= 10'd0 ;
    296             1                          2             Direct_Broadcast_n_del <= 1'b0 ;
    297                                                  end 
    298                                                  else begin 
    299                                                      if (i_engine_en) begin 
    300             1                     833535                 tmp_shift[0] <= Direct_Broadcast_n ;
    301             1                     833535                 tmp_shift[9:1] <= tmp_shift [8:0] ;
    302             1                     833535                 Direct_Broadcast_n_del <= tmp_shift[9] ; // delayed 8 system clk cycles 
    303                                                      end 
    304                                                      else begin 
    305             1                     219893                 Direct_Broadcast_n_del <= 1'b0 ;
    306             1                     219893                 tmp_shift <= 10'd0 ;
    307                                                      end  
    308                                                  end   
    309                                              end 
    310                                              
    311                                              // Defining Byte identification 
    312             1                     104401         always @(*) begin 
    313                                                      if      (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0] && i_regf_DBP)                                                         
    314             1                    ***0***                 Defining_byte = 1'b1;  // regular 
    315                                                      else if ( i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0] && ( i_regf_DTT == 3'd5 ||  i_regf_DTT == 3'd6 || i_regf_DTT == 3'd7))  
    316             1                    ***0***                 Defining_byte = 1'b1 ; // immediate      
    317                                                      else                                                                                                
    318             1                     104401                 Defining_byte = 1'b0 ;
    319                                                  end 
    320                                              
    321                                              
    322                                              ////////////////////////////////////////// state memory ////////////////////////////////////////////////
    323                                              
    324             1                    3680705         always @(posedge i_sys_clk or negedge i_sys_rst) begin
    325                                                      if (!i_sys_rst) begin
    326             1                          2                 current_state <= IDLE ;
    327                                                      end
    328                                                      else  begin
    329             1                    3680703                 current_state <= next_state ;
    330                                                      end
    331                                                  end
    332                                              
    333                                              ///////////////////////////////// next state and output logic //////////////////////////////////////////////
    334             1                   10327582         always@(*)begin
    335                                              
    336                                                  // initial values of outputs INTENTINAL LATCH that can be easily removed if STA analysis is fired 
    337                                              
    338             1                   10327582         o_sclstall_en      = 1'b0 ;  
    339             1                   10327582         o_sclstall_code    = 8'b0 ; 
    340             1                   10327582         o_tx_en            = 1'b0 ; 
    341             1                   10327582         o_tx_mode          = 4'b0 ; 
    342             1                   10327582         o_rx_en            = 1'b0 ; 
    343             1                   10327582         o_rx_mode          = 4'b0 ; 
    344             1                   10327582         o_bitcnt_en        = 1'b1 ; 
    345             1                   10327582         o_bitcnt_err_rst   = 1'b0 ; 
    346             1                   10327582         o_sdahand_pp_od    = 1'b1 ; // 1 means PP
    347             1                   10327582         o_regf_wr_en       = 1'b0 ;
    348             1                   10327582         o_regf_rd_en       = 1'b0 ;
    349             1                   10327582         o_engine_done      = 1'b0 ;
    350                                              
    351                                              
    352                                                      case (current_state)
    353                                              
    354                                                          IDLE : begin                     // aw arbitration if needed  
    355                                                              // sampling the configuration once a sequence
    356                                                              
    357             1                     876147                     i_regf_RnW       = i_i_regf_RnW       ;
    358             1                     876147                     i_regf_CMD_ATTR  = i_i_regf_CMD_ATTR  ;
    359             1                     876147                     i_regf_CMD       = i_i_regf_CMD       ;
    360             1                     876147                     i_regf_DEV_INDEX = i_i_regf_DEV_INDEX ;
    361             1                     876147                     i_regf_TOC       = i_i_regf_TOC       ;
    362             1                     876147                     i_regf_WROC      = i_i_regf_WROC      ;
    363             1                     876147                     i_regf_DTT       = i_i_regf_DTT       ;
    364             1                     876147                     i_regf_DBP       = i_i_regf_DBP       ;
    365             1                     876147                     i_regf_SRE       = i_i_regf_SRE       ;
    366                                              
    367             1                     876147                     first_time        = 1'b1 ;   // flag to help to differentiate between the direct and broadcast with assistance of Direct_Braodcast_n flag 
    368             1                     876147                     o_bitcnt_en       = 1'b0 ;
    369             1                     876147                     regular_counter   = 'd8  ;   // data starts from ninth location
    370             1                     876147                     immediate_counter = 'd4  ;   // data starts from forth location
    371             1                     876147                     o_engine_odd      = 1'b0 ;
    372             1                     876147                     controller_abort  = 1'b0 ;
    373             1                     876147                     o_tx_en           = 1'b0 ;
    374             1                     876147                     o_frmcnt_en       = 1'b0 ;
    375                                              
    376                                                              if (i_engine_en) begin 
    377             1                     200000                         next_state = PRE_CMD ;
    378             1                     200000                         o_tx_en    = 1'b1 ; 
    379             1                     200000                         o_tx_mode  = special_preamble ; 
    380                                                              end
    381                                                              else begin 
    382             1                     676147                         next_state = IDLE ;
    383                                                              end 
    384                                              
    385                                                          end 
    386                                              
    387                                                          PRE_CMD : begin // i'm driving the 2 bits with 2'b01
    388                                                              if (i_engine_en) begin 
    389             1                     451019                         o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ; 
    390             1                     451019                         o_tx_mode = special_preamble ; 
    391                                              
    392                                                                  if (i_tx_mode_done && !(i_frmcnt_last_frame || (Direct_Broadcast_n_del && first_time))) begin   
    393             1                     133349                             next_state = RNW ;
    394                                                                  end 
    395                                                                  else if ((i_tx_mode_done || (i_rx_mode_done && !i_rx_error)) && (i_frmcnt_last_frame  || (Direct_Broadcast_n_del && first_time))) begin  // at reading operation with matched data length
    396             1                      50324                             next_state = C_TOKEN_STATE ;
    397                                                                  end
    398                                                                  else if ((i_tx_mode_done || (i_rx_mode_done && i_rx_error)) && (i_frmcnt_last_frame  || (Direct_Broadcast_n_del && first_time))) begin  // at reading operation with matched data length
    399             1                    ***0***                             next_state = ERROR ;
    400             1                    ***0***                             o_regf_ERR_STATUS = FRAME ;
    401                                                                  end
    402                                                                  else begin 
    403             1                     267346                             next_state = PRE_CMD ;
    404                                                                  end
    405                                                              end 
    406                                                              else begin
    407             1                      99999                         next_state = IDLE ;
    408                                                              end
    409                                                          end 
    410                                              
    411                                                          PRE_CRC_TARGET : begin // target is driving the 2 bits with 2'b01
    412                                                              if (i_engine_en) begin
    413             1                      29502                         o_rx_en   = 1'b1 ; 
    414             1                      29502                         o_rx_mode = CRC_PREAMBLE ;
    415                                              
    416                                                                  if ((i_rx_mode_done ) && i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin  // HENAAAAAAAAAAAAAA PUT THE CONDITION AFTER VERIFICATIONS (i_rx_mode_done && ! rx_err)
    417             1                       7540                             next_state = C_TOKEN_STATE ;
    418                                                                  end
    419                                                                  else if (i_rx_mode_done ) begin  // at reading operation with matched data length    HENA BARDO PUT THE CONDITION (i_rx_mode_done && rx_err)

    422                                                                  end

    431                                              
    432                                                          RNW : begin
    433             1                     266698                     o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ;

    551                                                              
    552                                                                  if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0] && !i_regf_RnW) begin              // if regular command discriptor  (but long write) not supported cuurently but it's okk

    554             1                       1978                             o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    555             1                       1978                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; // regular counter starts with value 8 to point to the ninth location

    557                                                                  end

    564             1                      11633                             o_tx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    565                                                                                                    
    566                                                                      if (Defining_byte) begin 
    567             1                    ***0***                                 o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter + 1  ; // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to sixth location
    568             1                    ***0***                                 o_tx_mode   = serializing_byte_regf ;          // as first byte in the third location will contain the Defining Byte
    569                                                                      end 
    570                                                                      else begin 
    571             1                      11633                                 o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter ;        // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to fourth location
    572             1                      11633                                 o_tx_mode   = serializing_byte_regf ; 
    573                                                                      end 
    574                                                                  end
    575                                              
    576             1                      16540                         next_state = FIRST_DATA_BYTE ;
    577                                                              end 
    578                                              
    579                                                              else if (i_rx_mode_done && i_rx_pre) begin

    590                                              
    591                                              
    592                                                          CCC_BYTE : begin    // contains CCC value
    593                                              
    594             1                     400408                     o_tx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    595             1                     400408                     o_tx_mode    = serializing_byte_port ;
    596             1                     400408                     o_txrx_addr_ccc = i_regf_CMD ;
    597                                              
    598                                                              if (i_tx_mode_done && Defining_byte) begin   // if a defining byte exists
    599             1                    ***0***                         next_state = DEFINING_BYTE ;
    600                                                              end
    601                                                              else if (i_tx_mode_done && !Defining_byte) begin   
    602             1                      50051                         next_state = ZEROS ;
    603                                                              end 
    604                                                              else begin 
    605             1                     350357                         next_state = CCC_BYTE ;
    606                                                              end
    607                                              
    608                                                          end
    609                                              
    610                                                          DEFINING_BYTE : begin    // contains definaing byte if exist
    611             1                    ***0***                     o_tx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    612             1                    ***0***                     o_tx_mode    = serializing_byte_regf ; 
    613             1                    ***0***                     o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    614             1                    ***0***                     o_regf_addr  = first_location + 4 ;                 // fifth location (8 bits width)
    615             1                    ***0***                     o_frmcnt_en  = 1'b1 ;
    616                                              
    617                                                              if (i_tx_mode_done) begin   
    618             1                    ***0***                         next_state = PARITY_DATA ;
    619                                                              end
    620                                                              else begin 
    621             1                    ***0***                         next_state = DEFINING_BYTE ;
    622                                                              end  
    623                                                          end
    624                                              
    625                                                          ZEROS : begin                               // eight zeros fixed at regfile (e.g location 999)
    626             1                     520582                     o_tx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    627             1                     520582                     o_tx_mode    = serializing_byte_regf ; 
    628             1                     520582                     o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    629             1                     520582                     o_regf_addr  = first_location - 1  ;
    630                                              
    631                                                              // new (instead of just o_frmcnt_en  = 1'b1 ;)
    632                                                              if (Direct_Broadcast_n_del && first_time) begin 
    633             1                     300141                         o_frmcnt_en  = 1'b0 ;
    634                                                              end
    635                                                              else begin 
    636             1                     220441                         o_frmcnt_en  = 1'b1 ;
    637                                                              end  
    638                                                              //////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    639                                                              if (i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin 
    640             1                      74006                         o_engine_odd = 1'b1 ; 
    641                                                              end 
    642                                                              else begin 
    643             1                     446576                         o_engine_odd = 1'b0 ; 
    644                                                              end 
    645                                              
    646                                                              if (i_tx_mode_done) begin   
    647             1                      57411                         next_state = PARITY_DATA ;
    648                                              
    649                                                              end
    650                                                              else begin 
    651             1                     463171                         next_state = ZEROS ;
    652                                                              end
    653                                              
    654                                                              // erorr state condition is remaining   
    655                                                          end
    656                                              
    657                                                          PARITY_DATA : begin // parity state any Data word
    658                                                              if (!i_regf_RnW || first_time) begin // write 
    659             1                     189429                         o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    660             1                     189429                         o_tx_mode = parity_calc ;
    661                                                                  if  (i_tx_mode_done) begin // if broadcast
    662                                              
    663                                                                      if (i_frmcnt_last_frame || (Direct_Broadcast_n_del & first_time)) begin  // crc state only in case of Direct or in case of last data 
    664             1                      50324                                 next_state = PRE_CMD ; // BEGINING OF CRC 
    665                                                                      end 
    666                                                                      else begin 
    667             1                      12819                                 next_state = PRE_DATA_ONE ; // not last byte then continue sending/recieving repeated data 
    668                                                                      end 
    669                                                                  end
    670                                              
    671                                                                  else begin 
    672             1                     126286                             next_state = PARITY_DATA ;
    673                                                                  end
    674                                                              end 
    675                                                              else begin // read 
    676             1                      29502                         o_rx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    677             1                      29502                         o_rx_mode = parity_check ;
    678                                                                  if  (i_rx_mode_done && !i_rx_error) begin 
    679                                              
    680                                                                      if (i_frmcnt_last_frame || Direct_Broadcast_n_del) begin  // crc state only in case of Direct or in case of last data 
    681             1                       9834                                 next_state = PRE_CRC_TARGET ; // 
    682                                                                      end 
    683                                                                      else begin 
    684             1                    ***0***                                 next_state = PRE_DATA_ONE ; // not last byte then continue sending/recieving repeated data 
    685                                              
    686                                                                      end 
    687                                                                  end
    688                                              
    689                                                                  else if (i_rx_mode_done && i_rx_error) begin 
    690             1                    ***0***                             next_state = ERROR ;
    691             1                    ***0***                             o_regf_ERR_STATUS = PARITY_ERR ;
    692                                                                  end 
    693                                              
    694                                                                  else begin 
    695             1                      19668                             next_state = PARITY_DATA ;
    696                                                                  end
    697                                                              end 
    698                                                          end
    699                                              
    700                                                          PRE_DATA_ONE : begin  //  11  means ok continue , and 10 to be aborted 
    701                                                              if (!i_regf_RnW) begin // write 
    702             1                      25638                         o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    703             1                      25638                         o_tx_mode = one ;
    704             1                      25638                         o_rx_en   = 1'b0 ;
    705                                              
    706                                                                  if (i_tx_mode_done) begin
    707             1                      12819                             next_state = PRE_DATA_TWO ;
    708                                                                      //o_rx_en  = 1'b1 ;
    709                                                                      //o_rx_mode = preamble_rx_mode ;
    710                                                                  end
    711                                                                  else begin 
    712             1                      12819                             next_state = PRE_DATA_ONE ;
    713                                                                  end 
    714                                                              end 
    715                                              
    716                                                              else begin 
    717             1                    ***0***                         o_tx_en   = 1'b0 ;
    718             1                    ***0***                         o_rx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    719             1                    ***0***                         o_rx_mode = preamble_rx_mode ;
    720                                                                  
    721                                                                  if (i_rx_mode_done && i_rx_pre) begin
    722             1                    ***0***                             next_state = PRE_DATA_TWO ;
    723             1                    ***0***                             o_rx_mode  = preamble_rx_mode ;
    724                                                                  end
    725                                                                  else if (i_rx_mode_done && !i_rx_pre) begin
    726             1                    ***0***                             next_state = ERROR ;
    727             1                    ***0***                             o_regf_ERR_STATUS  = FRAME ;
    728                                                                  end
    729                                                                  else begin 
    730             1                    ***0***                             next_state = PRE_DATA_ONE ;
    731                                                                  end 
    732                                                              end 
    733                                                          end 
    734                                              
    735                                                          PRE_DATA_TWO : begin 
    736                                                              if (!i_regf_RnW) begin // write
    737             1                      38457                         o_tx_en   = 1'b0 ;
    738             1                      38457                         o_rx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    739             1                      38457                         o_rx_mode = preamble_rx_mode ;
    740                                              
    741                                                                  if (i_rx_mode_done && i_rx_pre) begin  // ack by target
    742             1                       6386                             next_state = FIRST_DATA_BYTE ;
    743                                                                  ////////////////////////////////// new ////////////////////////////////
    744             1                       6386                             o_tx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    745             1                       6386                             o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    746                                                                      if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0]) begin              // if regular command discriptor  
    747             1                       2451                                 o_tx_mode    = serializing_byte_regf ;
    748             1                       2451                                 o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; // regular counter starts with value 8 to point to the ninth location 
    749                                                                      end 
    750                                                                      else begin                                  // if immediate
    751                                                                          if (Defining_byte) begin 
    752             1                    ***0***                                     o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter + 1  ; // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to sixth location
    753                                                  
    754             1                    ***0***                                     o_tx_mode   = serializing_byte_regf ;          // as first byte in the third location will contain the Defining Byte
    755                                                                          end 
    756                                                                          else begin 
    757             1                       3935                                     o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter ;        // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to fourth location
    758             1                       3935                                     o_tx_mode   = serializing_byte_regf ; 
    759                                                                          end 
    760                                                                      end 
    761                                                                  //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    762                                                                  end
    763                                              
    764                                                                  else if (i_rx_mode_done && !i_rx_pre) begin // abort by target
    765             1                       6433                             next_state        = ERROR ;
    766             1                       6433                             o_regf_ERR_STATUS = T_ABORTED ;
    767                                                                  end 
    768                                              
    769                                                                  else begin 
    770             1                      25638                             next_state = PRE_DATA_TWO ;
    771                                                                  end 
    772                                                              end 
    773                                                              else begin 
    774                                                                  // tx signals 
    775             1                    ***0***                         o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    776                                                                  if (controller_abort) begin 
    777             1                    ***0***                             o_tx_mode = zero ;
    778                                                                  end 
    779                                                                  else begin 
    780             1                    ***0***                             o_tx_mode = one ;                   // open drain
    781                                                                      //o_sdahand_pp_od = open drain ; 
    782                                                                  end 
    783                                              
    784                                                                  
    785                                              
    786                                                                  if (i_tx_mode_done) begin  
    787             1                    ***0***                             next_state = FIRST_DATA_BYTE ;
    788                                                                  end
    789                                              
    790                                                                 
    791                                              
    792                                                                  else begin 
    793             1                    ***0***                             next_state = PRE_DATA_TWO ;
    794                                                                  end
    795                                                              end 
    796                                                              
    797                                                          end 
    798                                              
    799                                              
    800                                                          FIRST_DATA_BYTE : begin    // contains first repeated data byte
    801                                                              if (!i_regf_RnW) begin  // write operation 
    802             1                     110537                         o_tx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    803             1                     110537                         o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    804                                                                  if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0]) begin              // if regular command discriptor  
    805             1                      37665                             o_tx_mode    = serializing_byte_regf ;
    806             1                      37665                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; // regular counter starts with value 8 to point to the ninth location 
    807                                                                  end 
    808                                                                  else begin                                  // if immediate
    809                                                                      if (Defining_byte) begin 
    810             1                    ***0***                                 o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter + 1  ; // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to sixth location
    811                                                  
    812             1                    ***0***                                 o_tx_mode   = serializing_byte_regf ;          // as first byte in the third location will contain the Defining Byte
    813                                                                      end 
    814                                                                      else begin 
    815             1                      72872                                 o_regf_addr = first_location + immediate_counter ;        // for 8 bit width Regfile .. point to fourth location
    816             1                      72872                                 o_tx_mode   = serializing_byte_regf ; 
    817                                                                      end 
    818                                                                  end 
    819                                                              end 
    820                                              
    821                                                              // read operation 
    822                                                              else begin 
    823                                                              //////////////// new 3/5/2024 
    824                                                              if (i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin 
    825             1                      13238                         o_engine_odd = 1'b1 ; 
    826                                                              end 
    827                                                              else begin 
    828             1                      31311                         o_engine_odd = 1'b0 ; 
    829                                                              end 
    830                                                              ///////////////////////////////////////// 
    831             1                      44549                     o_rx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    832             1                      44549                     o_regf_wr_en = 1'b1 ;
    833                                                                  if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0]) begin              // if regular command discriptor  
    834             1                      30739                             o_rx_mode    = deserializing_byte ;
    835             1                      30739                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; // regular counter starts with value 4 to point to the fifth location 
    836                                                                  end 
    837                                                                  else begin  // there is no immediate case in the read operation 
    838             1                      13810                             next_state = ERROR ;
    839             1                      13810                             o_regf_ERR_STATUS = FRAME ;
    840                                                                  end 
    841                                                              end
    842                                              
    843                                                              // for both read and write 
    844                                                              if (i_tx_mode_done && i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin  // to handle odd number of bytes in both regular and immediate
    845             1                       7360                         next_state   = ZEROS ; 
    846                                                                  //o_engine_odd = 1'b1 ;            // to be put in the response discreptor      
    847                                                              end
    848                                              
    849                                                              //// new 3/5/2024
    850                                                              else if (i_rx_mode_done && i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin 
    851             1                       3721                         next_state = SECOND_DATA_BYTE ; 
    852                                                                  //immediate_counter = immediate_counter + 1 ;  there can't be immediate Transfer Command Discriptor with direct get 
    853             1                       3721                         regular_counter   = regular_counter + 1 ;
    854                                                              end 
    855                                                              /////////////////////
    856                                              
    857                                                              else if ((i_rx_mode_done | i_tx_mode_done) && !i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin  
    858             1                      11845                         next_state = SECOND_DATA_BYTE ; 
    859             1                      11845                         immediate_counter = immediate_counter + 1 ;
    860             1                      11845                         regular_counter   = regular_counter + 1 ;
    861                                                              end
    862                                                              else begin 
    863             1                     132160                         next_state = FIRST_DATA_BYTE ;
    864                                                              end
    865                                              
    866                                                          end
    867                                              
    868                                              
    869                                                          SECOND_DATA_BYTE : begin   // contains second repeated data byte
    870                                                              if (!i_regf_RnW) begin // write operation 
    871             1                      57320                         o_tx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    872             1                      57320                         o_regf_rd_en = 1'b1 ;
    873             1                      57320                         o_tx_mode    = serializing_byte_regf ;
    874                                                                  if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0]) begin              // if regular command discriptor  
    875             1                      21960                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; 
    876                                                                  end
    877                                                                  else begin 
    878             1                      35360                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + immediate_counter ; 
    879                                                                  end 
    880                                                                  if (i_tx_mode_done) begin 
    881             1                       5732                             next_state = PARITY_DATA ; 
    882                                                                      if (i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin 
    883                                                                          // no need to put conditions , immediated and regular can't happen together
    884             1                       5732                                 immediate_counter = immediate_counter ;
    885             1                       5732                                 regular_counter   = regular_counter   ;
    886                                                                      end 
    887                                                                      else begin 
    888                                                                          // no need to put conditions , immediated and regular can't happen together
    889             1                    ***0***                                 immediate_counter = immediate_counter + 1 ;
    890             1                    ***0***                                 regular_counter   = regular_counter   + 1 ;
    891                                                                      end        
    892                                                                  end
    893                                                                  else begin 
    894             1                      51588                             next_state = SECOND_DATA_BYTE ;
    895                                                                  end 
    896                                                              end 
    897                                                              else begin  // read operation 
    898                                                                  
    899             1                      99230                         o_rx_en      = 1'b1 ;
    900             1                      99230                         o_regf_wr_en = 1'b1 ;
    901             1                      99230                         o_rx_mode    = deserializing_byte ;
    902                                                                  if (!i_regf_CMD_ATTR[0]) begin                          // if regular command discriptor  
    903             1                      27841                             o_regf_addr  = first_location + regular_counter ; 
    904                                                                  end
    905                                                                  else begin  // there is no immediate case in the read operation 
    906             1                      71389                             next_state = ERROR ;
    907             1                      71389                             o_regf_ERR_STATUS = FRAME ;
    908                                                                  end 
    909                                                                  if (i_rx_mode_done) begin   
    910             1                       9834                             next_state = PARITY_DATA ;
    911                                                                      // no need to put conditions , immediated and regular can't happen together
    912                                                                      //immediate_counter = immediate_counter + 1 ;
    913             1                       9834                             regular_counter   = regular_counter   + 1 ;
    914                                                                  end 
    915                                                                  else begin 
    916             1                      89396                             next_state = SECOND_DATA_BYTE ;
    917                                                                  end
    918                                                              end     
    919                                                          end
    920                                                      
    921                                                          C_TOKEN_STATE : begin 
    922             1                     173592                     o_bitcnt_en        = 1'b0 ;
    923                                                              if (!i_regf_RnW || first_time) begin // write 
    924             1                     150972                         o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    925             1                     150972                         o_tx_mode = c_token_CRC ;
    926                                              
    927                                                                  if (i_tx_mode_done) begin 
    928             1                      50324                             next_state = CRC_CHECKSUM_STATE ; // 6 bits (5 checksum + 1 high to prepare for restart or exit)
    929                                                                  end 
    930                                                                  else begin 
    931             1                     100648                             next_state = C_TOKEN_STATE ;
    932                                                                  end
    933                                                              end 
    934                                                              else begin // read 
    935             1                      22620                         o_rx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    936             1                      22620                         o_rx_mode = check_c_token_CRC ;
    937                                                                  if (i_rx_error) begin 
    938             1                    ***0***                             next_state = ERROR ; 
    939             1                    ***0***                             o_regf_ERR_STATUS = CRC_ERR ;
    940                                                                  end
    941                                                                  else if (i_rx_mode_done && !i_rx_error) begin 
    942             1                       7540                             next_state = CRC_CHECKSUM_STATE ; // 5 bits checksum
    943                                                                  end 
    944                                                                  
    945                                                                  else begin 
    946             1                      15080                             next_state = C_TOKEN_STATE ;
    947                                                                  end
    948                                                              end  
    949                                                          end 
    950                                              
    951                                                          CRC_CHECKSUM_STATE : begin 
    952             1                     115728                     o_bitcnt_en        = 1'b0 ;
    953                                                              if (!i_regf_RnW || first_time) begin  // write 
    954             1                     100648                         o_tx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    955             1                     100648                         o_tx_mode = value_CRC ;
    956                                                                  if (i_tx_mode_done) begin 
    957                                                                      //////////////////////////// new /////////////////////////////////////////////
    958                                                                      if (!Direct_Broadcast_n_del && i_regf_TOC) begin 
    959             1                       5109                                 next_state    = EXIT_PATTERN ;
    960                                                                          //first_time       = 1'b0 ;
    961                                                                          //o_sclstall_en    = 1'b1 ;
    962                                                                          //o_sclstall_code  = exit_pattern_stall ;
    963                                                                      end
    964                                                                      else if (!Direct_Broadcast_n_del && !i_regf_TOC) begin 
    965             1                       5160                                 next_state = RESTART_PATTERN ;
    966                                                                          //o_sclstall_en   = 1'b1 ;
    967                                                                          //o_sclstall_code = restart_pattern_stall ;
    968                                                                          //first_time      = 1'b0 ;
    969                                                                      end  
    970                                                                      else if (Direct_Broadcast_n_del && first_time) begin 
    971             1                      33349                                 next_state = RESTART_PATTERN ;
    972                                                                          //o_sclstall_en   = 1'b1 ;
    973                                                                          //o_sclstall_code = restart_pattern_stall ;
    974                                                                          //first_time    = 1'b0 ;
    975                                                                      end
    976                                                                      else if (Direct_Broadcast_n_del && !first_time) begin 
    977                                                                          if (!i_regf_TOC) begin 
    978             1                       3351                                     next_state = RESTART_PATTERN ;
    979                                                                              //o_sclstall_en   = 1'b1 ;
    980                                                                              //o_sclstall_code = restart_pattern_stall ;
    981                                                                          end 
    982                                                                          else begin
    983             1                       3355                                     next_state      = EXIT_PATTERN ;
    984                                                                              //o_sclstall_en   = 1'b1 ;
    985                                                                              //o_sclstall_code = exit_pattern_stall ;
    986                                                                          end  
    987                                                                      end
    988                                                                  ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    989                                                                  end
    990                                                                  else begin 
    991             1                      50324                             next_state = CRC_CHECKSUM_STATE ;
    992                                                                  end 
    993                                                              end 
    994                                                              else begin 
    995             1                      15080                         o_rx_en   = 1'b1 ;
    996             1                      15080                         o_rx_mode = check_value_CRC ;
    997                                                                  if (i_rx_mode_done && !i_rx_error) begin 
    998                                                                      if (i_regf_TOC) begin 
    999             1                       3731                                 next_state    = EXIT_PATTERN ;
    1000                                                                         //first_time    = 1'b0 ;
    1001            1                       3731                                 o_tx_mode     = exit_pattern ;
    1002            1                       3731                                 o_tx_en       = 1'b1 ;
    1003            1                       3731                                 o_sclstall_en    = 1'b1 ;
    1004            1                       3731                                 o_sclstall_code  = exit_pattern_stall ;
    1005                                                                     end 
    1006                                                                     else begin  
    1007            1                       3809                                 next_state      = RESTART_PATTERN_SPECIAL ;
    1008            1                       3809                                 o_sclstall_en   = 1'b1 ;
    1009            1                       3809                                 o_sclstall_code = restart_pattern_stall_special ;
    1010                                                                         //first_time      = 1'b0 ;
    1011            1                       3809                                 o_tx_mode       = restart_pattern ;
    1012            1                       3809                                 o_tx_en         = 1'b1 ;
    1013                                                                     end
    1014                                                                 end
    1015                                                                 else begin 
    1016            1                       7540                             next_state = CRC_CHECKSUM_STATE ;
    1017                                                                 end 
    1018                                                             end  
    1019                                                         end 
    1020                                             
    1021                                             
    1022                                                         RESTART_PATTERN_SPECIAL : begin 
    1023            1                       7618                     first_time      = 1'b0 ;
    1024            1                       7618                     o_bitcnt_en     = 1'b0 ;
    1025                                                             // access timer and staller and tx to perform restart pattern 
    1026            1                       7618                     o_tx_en         = 1'b1 ;
    1027            1                       7618                     o_tx_mode       = restart_pattern ;
    1028            1                       7618                     o_sclstall_en   = 1'b1 ;
    1029            1                       7618                     o_sclstall_code = restart_pattern_stall_special ;
    1030                                             
    1031                                                             if (i_tx_mode_done  && i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin 
    1032            1                       3809                         next_state = FINISH ;
    1033            1                       3809                         o_sclstall_en   = 1'b0 ;
    1034                                                             end 
    1035                                                             else if (i_tx_mode_done  && !i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin 
    1036            1                    ***0***                         next_state = PRE_CMD ;
    1037            1                    ***0***                         o_sclstall_en   = 1'b0 ;
    1038                                                             end 
    1039                                                             else begin 
    1040            1                       3809                         next_state = RESTART_PATTERN_SPECIAL ;
    1041                                                             end
    1042                                                         end 
    1043                                             
    1044                                             
    1045                                                         RESTART_PATTERN : begin 
    1046            1                      83720                     first_time      = 1'b0 ;
    1047            1                      83720                     o_bitcnt_en     = 1'b0 ;
    1048                                                             // access timer and staller and tx to perform restart pattern 
    1049            1                      83720                     o_tx_en         = 1'b1 ;
    1050            1                      83720                     o_tx_mode       = restart_pattern ;
    1051            1                      83720                     o_sclstall_en   = 1'b1 ;
    1052            1                      83720                     o_sclstall_code = restart_pattern_stall ;
    1053                                             
    1054                                                             if (i_tx_mode_done  && i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin 
    1055            1                       8511                         next_state = FINISH ;
    1056            1                       8511                         o_sclstall_en   = 1'b0 ;
    1057                                                             end 
    1058                                                             else if (i_tx_mode_done  && !i_frmcnt_last_frame) begin 
    1059            1                      33349                         next_state = PRE_CMD ;
    1060            1                      33349                         o_sclstall_en   = 1'b0 ;
    1061                                                             end 
    1062                                                             else begin 
    1063            1                      41860                         next_state = RESTART_PATTERN ;
    1064                                                             end
    1065                                                         end 
    1066                                             
    1067                                             
    1068                                             
    1069                                             
    1070                                                         EXIT_PATTERN : begin 
    1071                                                             // access timer and staller and tx to perform exit pattern 
    1072            1                     250845                     first_time       = 1'b0 ; // no need but it's ok 
    1073            1                     250845                     o_tx_en          = 1'b1 ;
    1074            1                     250845                     o_tx_mode        = exit_pattern ;
    1075            1                     250845                     o_sclstall_en    = 1'b1 ;

    1079                                             
    1080                                                             if (i_tx_mode_done) begin 
    1081            1                      87680                         next_state = FINISH ;

    1083                                                             end

    1086                                                             end
    1087                                                         end
    1088

    1090                                             
    1091                                              
    1092                                                         ERROR : begin      // controller error state

    1094

    1096                                                             if(i_bitcnt_number == 37) begin

    15                                               ////////////////////////////////////// there is 2 versions of the bits counter uncomment only one of them ////////////////////////////////////////
    16                                               
    17                                               
    18                                               // sequential version the counter is incremented in the middle of the SCL period

    29                                                               end

    10                                               input [4:0]  i_crc_crc_value, //separate calculation of crc (of what serialized) in another block
