    12                                               input        i_regf_read_n_write_bit,
    13                                               
    14                                               
    15                                               output reg        o_sdahnd_serial_data, //SDA
    16                                               output reg        o_ddrccc_mode_done,
    17                                               output reg        o_crc_en, 
    18                                               output reg [7:0]  o_crc_parallel_data ,//sending byte byte of what serialized for crc block
    19                                               output reg        o_crc_last_byte,
    20                                               output reg        o_crc_data_valid
    21                                               );
    22                                               
    23                                               
    24                                               // tx modes needed  
    25                                               localparam [3:0]  special_preambles = 'b0000, //2'b01 
    26                                                                 serializing_address = 'b0001, //address of target
    27                                                   				          serializing_zeros = 'b0011 ,  //7-zeros in the first byte of cmd word        
    28                                                                 one = 'b0010, // for representing preamble bit or reading_or_writing bit  
    29                                                                 zero = 'b0110, // for representing preamble bit or reading_or_writing bit
    30                                               				          serializing_data = 'b0111, //data byte from reg to be serialized
    31                                               				          CCC_value = 'b0101 , //special data in case of transmitting CCC
    32                                               				          calculating_Parity = 'b0100, //parity of word serialized either cmd word or data word
    33                                               				          token_CRC = 'b1100, //special bits 4'b1100
    34                                               				          CRC_value = 'b1101, //CRC value arrived of data serialized
    35                                                                 restart_Pattern = 'b1111,
    36                                                                 exit_Pattern = 'b1110;
    37                                               
    38                                               
    39                                               /**special values*/			  
    40              1                          1     reg [1:0] special_preamble = 'b01 ;
    41              1                          1     reg [3:0] token = 4'b1100;
    42              1                          1     reg [6:0] reserved =7'b0000000; //00//
    43                                               
    44                                               
    45                                               /**internal signals*/
    46                                               wire parity_adj; 
    47                                               wire [7:0] A; //CMD_Word_Second_Byte
    48                                               wire P1, P0; //parity bits to be serialized
    49                                               wire P1_cmdword, P0_cmdword; //parity bits of cmdword
    50                                               wire P1_data, P0_data; //parity bits of data
    51                                               wire [1:0] P;
    52                                               reg [7:0] D1, D2; //first_and_second_Data_Bytes
    53                                               reg	crc_indicator ; //00//
    54                                               reg [4:0] crc_temp ; //00//
    55                                               reg [4:0] crc; //00//
    56                                               
    57                                               
    58                                               
    59                                               /**helpful flags*/
    60                                               integer counter;
    61                                               reg reset_counter_flag;
    62                                               reg rd_wr_flag; //storing rd_or_wr bit for calculating (parity adj) and (cmd word parity)
    63                                               reg parity_flag; //to distinguish parity is calculated for cmd or data
    64                                               reg first_byte_full; //to distinguish tx is serializing first byte or second byte
    65                                               
    66                                               
    67                                               
    68                                               assign A = {i_ddrccc_special_data[6:0],parity_adj} ; 
    69              1                     360133     assign parity_adj = ( rd_wr_flag ^ (^i_ddrccc_special_data) ) ;
    70              1                     434412     assign P1 = (parity_flag)? P1_data : P1_cmdword ; 
    71              1                     493913     assign P0 = (parity_flag)? P0_data : P0_cmdword ;
    72                                               assign P = {P1,P0} ;
    73              1                     356007     assign P1_cmdword = rd_wr_flag ^ A[7] ^ A[5] ^ A[3] ^ A[1] ;
    74                                               assign P0_cmdword = A[6] ^ A[4] ^ A[2] ^ A[0] ^ 1 ;
    75              1                      66896     assign P1_data = D1[7] ^ D1[5] ^ D1[3] ^ D1[1] ^ D2[7] ^ D2[5] ^ D2[3] ^ D2[1] ;
    76                                               assign P0_data = D1[6] ^ D1[4] ^ D1[2] ^ D1[0] ^ D2[6] ^ D2[4] ^ D2[2] ^ D2[0] ^ 1 ; 
    77                                               
    78                                               
    79              1                   18594456      always @ (posedge i_sys_clk or negedge i_sys_rst)
    80                                               	begin 
    81                                               	
    82                                               		if(~i_sys_rst) begin 
    83              1                          2     		    o_sdahnd_serial_data<= 1;
    84              1                          2             o_ddrccc_mode_done<= 0;
    85              1                          2             o_crc_parallel_data<= 0;
    86              1                          2             o_crc_en<= 0;
    87              1                          2     		    counter <= 0;
    88              1                          2     		    reset_counter_flag <= 0;
    89              1                          2     		    parity_flag <= 0;
    90              1                          2     		    first_byte_full <= 0;
    91              1                          2     		    o_crc_en <= 0; 
    92                                               		end 
    93                                               		
    94                                               		else if (i_ddrccc_tx_en) begin
    95                                               		  
    96              1                   11239744     		o_ddrccc_mode_done <= 0;
    97              1                   11239744     		o_crc_data_valid <= 'b0;
    98              1                   11239744     		 o_crc_en <= 'b0;
    99              1                   11239744     		 o_crc_last_byte <= 'b0;
    100                                              		
    101                                              		case (i_ddrccc_tx_mode)
    102                                              		  
    103                                              		  ///////////////////////
    104                                              		  
    105                                              		serializing_zeros : begin
    106                                              		  
    107             1                    1866886     		  o_crc_parallel_data <= {i_regf_read_n_write_bit , reserved};
    108             1                    1866886     		  o_crc_en <= 'b1;
    109                                              		//	o_crc_data_valid <= 'b1;
    110                                              
    111                                              		 if (i_sclgen_scl_neg_edge || i_sclgen_scl_pos_edge)
    112                                              		   begin
    113             1                     933443     		    o_sdahnd_serial_data <= 1'b0 ;    
    114                                              		    if ( (!reset_counter_flag) )
    115                                              		      begin
    116             1                     133349                counter <= 'd0;
    117             1                     133349                reset_counter_flag <= 1;
    118             1                     133349     		   o_crc_data_valid <= 'b1;
    119                                                        end
    120                                                        
    121                                              			  else
    122                                              			    begin
    123                                              			     if ( counter == 'd5 ) begin 
    124             1                     133349     			      o_ddrccc_mode_done <= 'b1;
    125                                              				  end
    126             1                     800094     			      counter <= counter + 1;
    127                                              				 			 
    128                                              				 
    129                                              			    end
    130                                              			    
    131                                              			 end
    132                                              			 
    133                                              			else if ( counter == 'd6 )
    134                                              			  begin
    135             1                     133349     			 reset_counter_flag <= 0;
    136                                              			 
    137                                              			 end
    138                                              		  
    139                                              		  end
    140                                              	
    141                                              		/////////////////////////////////
    142                                              		  
    143                                              		one : begin
    144                                              		  
    145                                              		//	o_crc_en <= 'b1;
    146             1                     332354     			o_crc_last_byte <= 'b0;
    147                                              		  if (i_sclgen_scl_neg_edge || i_sclgen_scl_pos_edge)
    148                                              		   begin
    149                                              		     
    150                                              		     if (  (!reset_counter_flag) )
    151                                              		      begin
    152             1                     166177                counter <= 0;
    153             1                     166177                reset_counter_flag <= 1;
    154             1                     166177                o_sdahnd_serial_data <= 1;
    155             1                     166177     			     o_ddrccc_mode_done <= 'b1;
    156                                                        end
    157                                              			 end
    158                                              			 
    159                                              			else if ( counter == 'd0 )
    160                                              			  begin
    161             1                     166177     			 rd_wr_flag <= 'b1;
    162             1                     166177     			 reset_counter_flag <= 0;
    163                                              			 
    164                                              			 end
    165                                              		  end
    166                                              		  
    167                                              		  ////////////////////////////
    168                                              		  
    169                                              		 zero : begin
    170                                              		//  o_crc_en <= 'b1;
    171             1                     226680     			o_crc_last_byte <= 'b0;
    172                                              		  
    173                                              		  if (i_sclgen_scl_neg_edge || i_sclgen_scl_pos_edge)
    174                                              		   begin
    175                                              		     if ( (!reset_counter_flag) )
    176                                              		      begin
    177             1                     113340                counter <= 'd0;
    178             1                     113340                reset_counter_flag <= 1;
    179             1                     113340        		      o_sdahnd_serial_data <= 0;
    180             1                     113340     			     o_ddrccc_mode_done <= 1;
    181                                                        end
    182                                              			 end
    183                                              			 
    184                                              			else if ( counter == 'd0 )
    185                                              			  begin
    186             1                     113340     			 rd_wr_flag <= 'b0;
    187             1                     113340     			 reset_counter_flag <= 0;
    188                                              			 
    189                                              			 end
    190                                              		  end
    191                                              		  
    192                                              		  /////////////////////////////////////
    193                                              		
    194                                              		special_preambles : begin
    195                                              		 
    196             1                     834691     		o_crc_last_byte <= 'b0;
    197                                              		  
    198                                              		  if (i_sclgen_scl_neg_edge || i_sclgen_scl_pos_edge)
    199                                              		   begin
    200                                              		        
    201                                              		    if ( (!reset_counter_flag) )
    202                                              		      begin
    203             1                     183673                counter <= 'd0;
    204             1                     183673                reset_counter_flag <= 1;
    205             1                     183673                o_sdahnd_serial_data <= special_preamble['d1] ; 
    206                                                        end
    207                                                        
    208                                              			  else
    209                                              			    begin
    210             1                     183673     			    counter <= counter + 1;
    211             1                     183673     			    o_sdahnd_serial_data <= special_preamble['d0 - counter] ;
    212                                              			    if ( counter == 'd0 ) begin
    213             1                     183673     			       o_ddrccc_mode_done <= 'b1;
    214             1                     183673     				   parity_flag <= 0;  // to make P1=P1_cmd &P0=P0_cmd
    215                                              				   end
    216                                              			    end
    217                                              			    
    218                                              			 end
    219                                              			 
    220                                              			else if ( counter == 'd1 )
    221                                              			  begin
    222             1                     183673     			 reset_counter_flag <= 0;
    223                                              			 
    224                                              			 end
    225                                              			 
    226                                              		 end	
    227                                              		 ////////////////////////////////////
    228                                              		 
    229                                              		 CCC_value :  begin
    230                                              		  
    231             1                     800816     		  o_crc_last_byte <= 'b0;
    232             1                     800816     		  o_crc_en <= 'b1;
    233             1                     800816     		  o_crc_parallel_data <= i_ddrccc_special_data;
    234                                              			
    235                                              		  if (i_sclgen_scl_neg_edge || i_sclgen_scl_pos_edge)
    236                                              		   begin    
    237                                              		    if ((!reset_counter_flag) )
    238                                              		      begin
    239             1                      50051                counter <= 'd0;
    240             1                      50051                reset_counter_flag <= 1;
    241             1                      50051                o_sdahnd_serial_data <= i_ddrccc_special_data['d7] ;
    242             1                      50051     		   o_crc_data_valid <= 'b1;
    243                                                         end
    244                                                        
    245                                              			  else
    246                                              			    begin
    247             1                     350357     			    counter <= counter + 1;
    248             1                     350357     			    o_sdahnd_serial_data <= i_ddrccc_special_data['d6 - counter] ;
    249                                              			    if ( counter == 'd6 )
    250                                              					begin
    251             1                      50051     			       o_ddrccc_mode_done <= 'b1;
    252                                              				   end
    253                                              			    end
    254                                              			 end
    255                                              			 
    256                                              	 else if ( counter == 'd7 )
    257                                              			begin
    258             1                      50051     			 reset_counter_flag <= 0;
    259                                              			 
    260             1                      50051     			 parity_flag <= 1;
    261                                              			 if (!first_byte_full)
    262                                              			   begin
    263             1                      50051     			    D1 <= i_ddrccc_special_data;
    264             1                      50051     			    first_byte_full <= 1;
    265                                              			   end
    266                                              			 else
    267                                              			   begin
    268             1                    ***0***     			    D2 <= i_ddrccc_special_data;
    269             1                    ***0***     			    first_byte_full <= 0;
    270                                              			   end
    271                                              		  end
    272                                              			 
    273                                              	 end	
    274                                              		
    275                                              		 ///////////////////////////////////
    276                                              		  
    277                                              		serializing_data :  begin
    278                                              		  
    279             1                    1226665     			o_crc_en <= 'b1;
    280             1                    1226665     			o_crc_parallel_data <= i_regf_tx_parallel_data;
    281             1                    1226665     			o_crc_last_byte <= 'b0;
    282                                              			//o_crc_data_valid <= 'b1;
    283                                              			
    284                                              		  if (i_sclgen_scl_neg_edge || i_sclgen_scl_pos_edge)
    285                                              		   begin    
    286                                              		    if (  (!reset_counter_flag) )
    287                                              		      begin
    288             1                      83140                counter <= 'd0;
    289             1                      83140                reset_counter_flag <= 1;
    290             1                      83140                o_sdahnd_serial_data <= i_regf_tx_parallel_data['d7] ;
    291             1                      83140     		   o_crc_data_valid <= 'b1;
    292                                                         end
    293                                                        
    294                                              			  else
    295                                              			    begin
    296             1                     533645     			    counter <= counter + 1;
    297             1                     533645     			    o_sdahnd_serial_data <= i_regf_tx_parallel_data['d6 - counter] ;
    298                                              			    if ( counter == 'd6 ) begin
    299             1                      76235     			      o_ddrccc_mode_done <= 'b1;
    300                                              				  end
    301                                              				//  o_crc_data_valid <= 'b0;
    302                                              			    end
    303                                              			 end
    304                                              			 
    305                                              	 else if ( counter == 'd7 )
    306                                              			begin
    307             1                      76235     			 reset_counter_flag <= 0;
    308                                              			 
    309             1                      76235     			 parity_flag <= 1;
    310                                              			 if (!first_byte_full)
    311                                              			   begin
    312             1                      13092     			    D1 <= i_regf_tx_parallel_data;
    313             1                      13092     			    first_byte_full <= 1;
    314                                              			   end
    315                                              			 else
    316                                              			   begin
    317             1                      63143     			    D2 <= i_regf_tx_parallel_data;
    318             1                      63143     			    first_byte_full <= 0;
    319                                              			   end
    320                                              		  end
    321                                              			 
    322                                              	 end	
    323                                              	 
    324                                              	 /////////////////////////////
    325                                              		 
    326                                              		serializing_address :  begin
    327                                              
    328             1                    2133584     				  o_crc_parallel_data <= A;	 
    329             1                    2133584     				  o_crc_en <= 'b1;
    330             1                    2133584     				  o_crc_last_byte <= 'b0;			
    331                                              					
    332                                              		
    333                                              		if (i_sclgen_scl_neg_edge || i_sclgen_scl_pos_edge)
    334                                              		   begin    
    335                                              		    if (  (!reset_counter_flag) )
    336                                              		      begin
    337             1                     133349                counter <= 'd0;
    338             1                     133349                reset_counter_flag <= 1;
    339             1                     133349                o_sdahnd_serial_data <= A['d7] ;
    340             1                     133349     		   o_crc_data_valid <= 'b1;
    341                                              		  
    342                                                         end
    343                                                        
    344                                              			  else
    345                                              			    begin
    346             1                     933443     			    counter <= counter + 1;
    347             1                     933443     			    o_sdahnd_serial_data <= A['d6 - counter] ;
    348                                              			    if ( counter == 'd6 ) begin
    349             1                     133349     			      o_ddrccc_mode_done <= 'b1;
    350                                              			    end
    351                                              			//	o_crc_data_valid <= 'b0;
    352                                              				end
    353                                              			    
    354                                              			 end
    355                                              			 
    356                                              			else if ( (counter == 'd7) )
    357                                              			  begin
    358             1                     133349     			 reset_counter_flag <= 0;
    359                                              			 
    360                                              			 end
    361                                              			 
    362                                              			 
    363                                              			 
    364                                              		 end	
    365                                              		 
    366                                              		 /////////////////////////////////
    367                                              		 
    368                                              		 
    369                                              		 calculating_Parity : begin
    370             1                     785968     		   o_crc_en <= 'b0;
    371                                              		   if (i_sclgen_scl_neg_edge || i_sclgen_scl_pos_edge)
    372                                              		    begin
    373                                              		      
    374                                              		     if (  (!reset_counter_flag))
    375                                              		     begin
    376             1                     196492               counter <= 'd0;
    377             1                     196492               reset_counter_flag <= 1;
    378             1                     196492               o_sdahnd_serial_data <= P[1];
    379                                                       end
    380                                              			  else
    381                                              			    begin
    382             1                     196492     			    counter <= counter + 1;
    383             1                     196492     			    o_sdahnd_serial_data <= P[(0 - counter)];
    384                                              			    if ( counter == 'd0 )
    385             1                     196492     			      o_ddrccc_mode_done <= 'b1;
    386                                              			    end
    387                                              			    
    388                                              			 end
    389                                              			 
    390                                              			else if ( counter == 1 )
    391                                              			 begin
    392             1                     196492     			  reset_counter_flag <= 0;
    393                                              			  
    394                                              			 end
    395                                              
    396                                              		 end	  
    397                                              		 
    398                                              		 
    399                                              		 /////////////////////////////////
    400                                              				  				  		  
    401                                              		token_CRC :	 begin
    402                                              
    403                                              		/* if (crc_indicator)
    404                                              				crc <= crc_temp;
    405                                              		  else 	
    406                                              				crc <= i_crc_crc_value;*/
    407                                              				
    408                                              
    409                                              		if (i_sclgen_scl_neg_edge || i_sclgen_scl_pos_edge)
    410                                              		   begin
    411                                                  
    412                                              		    if ( (!reset_counter_flag))
    413                                              		     begin
    414             1                      50324               counter <= 'd0;
    415             1                      50324               reset_counter_flag <= 1;
    416             1                      50324               o_sdahnd_serial_data <= token[3];
    417             1                      50324     		   o_crc_en <= 'b1;
    418             1                      50324     		   o_crc_last_byte <= 'b1;
    419                                              		  
    420                                              			end
    421                                              			  else
    422                                              			    begin
    423             1                     150972     			    counter <= counter + 1;
    424             1                     150972     			    o_sdahnd_serial_data <= token[(2 - counter)];
    425                                              			    if ( counter == 'd2 )
    426                                              					begin 
    427             1                      50324     			      o_ddrccc_mode_done <= 'b1;
    428                                              					
    429                                              					end
    430                                              			    end
    431                                              			    
    432                                              			 end
    433                                              			 
    434                                              			else if ( counter == 3 )
    435                                              			  begin
    436             1                      50324     			 reset_counter_flag <= 0;
    437                                              			 
    438                                              			 end
    439                                              
    440                                              		 end	 
    441                                              		
    442                                              		/////////////////////////////////////////
    443                                              		 
    444                                              		CRC_value :  begin
    445             1                     503240     		  crc_indicator <= 'b0;
    446                                              		
    447                                              		if (i_sclgen_scl_neg_edge || i_sclgen_scl_pos_edge)
    448                                              		    begin    
    449                                              		     if ( (!reset_counter_flag))
    450                                              		       begin
    451             1                      50324     		        o_sdahnd_serial_data <= i_crc_crc_value[4]; 
    452             1                      50324     				counter <= 'd0;
    453             1                      50324     				reset_counter_flag <= 1;  
    454                                                         end
    455                                              			   else
    456                                              			     begin
    457             1                     201296     			    counter <= counter + 1;
    458             1                     201296     			    o_sdahnd_serial_data <= i_crc_crc_value[(3 - counter)];
    459                                              			    if ( counter == 'd3 )
    460             1                      50324     			      o_ddrccc_mode_done <= 'b1;
    461                                              			    end
    462                                              			  end
    463                                              			    
    464                                              			else if ( counter == 'd4 )
    465                                              			 begin
    466             1                      50324     			  reset_counter_flag <= 0; 
    467                                              			 end
    468                                              			 
    469                                              			 
    470                                              				
    471                                              			 
    472                                              	  end
    473                                              			  
    474                                              			  /////////////////////////////////////////////
    475                                              			  
    476                                              		restart_Pattern: begin
    477                                              			  
    478                                              		  if (i_sclgen_scl_neg_edge || i_sclgen_scl_pos_edge)
    479                                              		    begin    
    480                                              		     if (!reset_counter_flag)
    481                                              		       begin
    482             1                      45669     		        o_sdahnd_serial_data <= 1;
    483             1                      45669                 counter <= 'd0;
    484             1                      45669                 reset_counter_flag <= 1; 
    485                                                         end
    486                                                         
    487                                              			   else
    488                                              			    begin
    489             1                     228345     			     counter <= counter + 1;
    490             1                     228345     			     o_sdahnd_serial_data <= !o_sdahnd_serial_data;
    491                                              			     if ( counter == 'd4 )
    492             1                      45669     			      o_ddrccc_mode_done <= 'b1;
    493                                              			    end	  
    494                                              			  end
    495                                              			 
    496                                              	    else if ( counter == 'd5 )
    497                                              			 begin
    498             1                      45669     			  reset_counter_flag <= 0;
    499                                              			 end
    500                                              		  end
    501                                              		  
    502                                              			  ////////////////////////////////////////////
    503                                              			  
    504                                              			exit_Pattern: begin
    505                                              			  
    506                                              		  if (i_sclgen_scl_neg_edge || i_sclgen_scl_pos_edge)
    507                                              		    begin    
    508                                              		     if (!reset_counter_flag)
    509                                              		       begin
    510             1                      87680     		        o_sdahnd_serial_data <= 1;
    511             1                      87680                 counter <= 'd0;
    512             1                      87680                 reset_counter_flag <= 1; 
    513                                                         end

    102                                              		.o_sdahand_pp_od(i_sdr_scl_gen_pp_od_tb), 	 	 	 	 	 	  
    103

    105

    107                                              		.o_regf_rd_en(o_regf_rd_en_tb),
    108                                              		.o_regf_addr(o_regf_addr_tb),
    109                                              		.o_engine_done(o_engine_done_tb),
    110                                              		.o_txrx_addr_ccc(o_txrx_addr_ccc_tb),
    111                                              		.o_engine_odd(o_engine_odd_tb),
    112                                              		.o_regf_ERR_STATUS(o_regf_ERR_STATUS_tb),
    113                                              
    114                                              		.o_en_mux(en_mux)       // new
    115                                              		);

    296

    304

    320                                              		.o_crc_data_valid 		 (o_crc_data_valid_tx_tb)	// new
    321                                              );
    322                                              
    323                                                  wire 		mux1_out1 ;

    327

    329

    374                                              	
    375                                              );
    376                                              
    377                                              
    378                                                  	// initialize the object with the default values in the class defined as bit >> 0
    379                                                  	configuration conf_obj ;
    380                                              
    381                                              
    382                                                  	// inputs to be randomized 
    383                                              
    384                                                  	//////////////////////// DWORD0  //////////////////////
    385                                                  	reg [2:0] RAND_CMD_ATTR      ;
    386                                                  	reg [3:0] RAND_TID           ;
    387                                               		reg [7:0] RAND_CMD           ;
    388                                               		reg 	  RAND_CP            ;
    389                                               		reg [4:0] RAND_DEV_INDEX     ;
    390                                               		reg [1:0] RAND_RESERVED      ;
    391                                               		reg [2:0] RAND_DTT           ; 	 	 // or {DBP,SRE,reserved}
    392                                               		reg [2:0] RAND_MODE          ;
    393                                               		reg  	  RAND_RnW           ;
    394                                               		reg   	  RAND_WROC          ;
    395                                               		reg 	  RAND_TOC           ;
    396                                              
    397                                                  	//////////////////////// DWORD1  //////////////////////
    398                                                  	reg [7:0] RAND_DEF_BYTE     ;
    399                                                  	reg [7:0] RAND_DATA_TWO     ;
    400                                                  	reg [7:0] RAND_DATA_THREE   ;
    401                                                  	reg [7:0] RAND_DATA_FOUR    ;
    402                                              
    403                                                  	/////////////////////// SDA Line //////////////////////
    404                                                  	//reg  	  RAND_SDA ;
    405                                              
    406                                                  	integer i ;
    407                                              
    408                                              	//----------------------------------- Functional Coverage --------------------------------------//
    409                                              	//------------------------------------ FIRST GROUP ENEC_B -----------------------------------------//
    410                                              	// for every two rows in the excell sheet corresponds to a covergroup
    411                                              
    412                                              	covergroup ENEC_Broadcast @(posedge i_sys_clk_tb);
    413                                              		// coverpoint for operands 
    414                                              		o_tx_en : coverpoint o_tx_en_tb 
    415                                              		iff (i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1 )
    416                                              		{
    417                                              			bins tx_en_0 = {0};
    418                                              			bins tx_en_1 = {1};
    419                                              		}
    420                                              
    421                                              		o_tx_mode_TOC_0 : coverpoint o_tx_mode_tb iff (
    422                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1 && !i_regf_TOC_tb && i_engine_en_tb) 
    423                                              		{
    424                                              			bins tx_special_preamble 	  = {special_preamble};
    425                                              			bins tx_zero 				  = {zero};
    426                                              			bins tx_seven_zeros 		  = {seven_zeros};
    427                                              			bins tx_serializing_address   = {serializing_address};
    428                                              			bins tx_parity_calc 		  = {parity_calc};
    429                                              			bins tx_one 	 			  = {one};
    430                                              			bins tx_serializing_byte_port = {serializing_byte_port};
    431                                              			bins tx_c_token_CRC 		  = {c_token_CRC};
    432                                              			bins tx_value_CRC			  = {value_CRC};
    433                                              			bins tx_restart_pattern		  = {restart_pattern};
    434                                              			//illegal_bins tx_exit_pattern  = {exit_pattern};
    435                                              
    436                                              			// sequence bin to be added 
    437                                              		}
    438                                              
    439                                              		o_tx_mode_TOC_1 : coverpoint o_tx_mode_tb iff (
    440                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1 && i_regf_TOC_tb && i_engine_en_tb)
    441                                              		{
    442                                              			bins tx_special_preamble 	  = {special_preamble};
    443                                              			bins tx_zero 				  = {zero};
    444                                              			bins tx_seven_zeros 		  = {seven_zeros};
    445                                              			bins tx_serializing_address   = {serializing_address};
    446                                              			bins tx_parity_calc 		  = {parity_calc};
    447                                              			bins tx_one 	 			  = {one};
    448                                              			bins tx_serializing_byte_port = {serializing_byte_port};
    449                                              			bins tx_c_token_CRC 		  = {c_token_CRC};
    450                                              			bins tx_value_CRC			  = {value_CRC};
    451                                              			bins tx_exit_pattern		  = {exit_pattern};
    452                                              			//illegal_bins tx_restart_pattern  = {restart_pattern};
    453                                              
    454                                              			// sequence bin to be added 
    455                                              		}
    456                                              		o_sclstall_en : coverpoint o_sclstall_en_tb iff (
    457                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1) 
    458                                              		{
    459                                              			bins o_sclstall_en_0 = {0};
    460                                              			bins o_sclstall_en_1 = {1};
    461                                              		}
    462                                              
    463                                              		o_sclstall_code_TOC_0 : coverpoint i_stall_cycles iff (
    464                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1 && i_regf_TOC_tb == 0 && i_engine_en_tb)
    465                                              		{
    466                                              			bins o_stall_cycles_restart = {restart_pattern_stall};
    467                                              			//illegal_bins o_stall_cycles_exit = {exit_pattern_stall};
    468                                              		}
    469                                              
    470                                              		o_sclstall_code_TOC_1 : coverpoint i_stall_cycles iff (
    471                                              			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd1 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h00 && i_regf_DTT_tb == 3'd1 && i_regf_TOC_tb == 1 && i_engine_en_tb)
    472                                              		{
    473                                              			//illegal_bins o_stall_cycles_restart = {restart_pattern_stall};
    474                                              			bins o_stall_cycles_exit = {exit_pattern_stall};
    475                                              		}
    476                                              
    477                                              
    478                                              		o_rx_en : coverpoint o_rx_en_tb iff (

    2904                                             		}
    2905                                             
    2906                                             		o_frmcnt_en : coverpoint o_frmcnt_en_tb iff (
    2907                                             			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd0 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h8D && !i_regf_DBP_tb  && i_regf_DATA_LEN_tb == 6)

    2909                                             			bins o_frmcnt_en_0 = {0};

    2960                                             		}
    2961

    2963                                             			i_regf_CMD_ATTR_tb  == 3'd0 && i_regf_CMD_tb == 8'h8D && !i_regf_DBP_tb  && i_regf_DATA_LEN_tb == 6)

    2980                                             		}
    2981                                             
    2982                                             	endgroup
    2983                                             
    2984                                             	GETPID_Direct  GETPID_Direct_instance = new();
    2985                                             */
    2986                                             // 4-initial block 
    2987                                             /* IMPORTANT NOTES :
    2988                                             		1- (General) when driving input to the block which is considered as output of other block u must drive it at posedge not at negdge .
    2989                                             		2- (specifically for our system) : to predict the time to set the tx mode done u count like that >>
    2990                                             				(no. of SCL_DDR clk cycle - 1) + 1 sys clk  
    2991                                             */
    2992                                             
    2993                                             	initial begin 
    2994                                             		// time zero .. these are all signal to be driven in the test bench 
    2995            1                          1     		i_sclgen_rst_n_tb 	   = 1'b1 ;
    2996            1                          1     		i_scl_gen_stall_tb     = 1'b0 ;
    2997            1                          1     		i_sdr_ctrl_scl_idle_tb = 1'b0 ;
    2998            1                          1     		i_timer_cas_tb 	 	   = 1'b0 ;
    2999            1                          1     		i_engine_en_tb         = 1'b0 ;
    3000                                             		
    3001                                             		//i_rst_n_tb        = 1'b0 ; // asserted 
    3002            1                          1     		#(CLK_PERIOD) i_sclgen_rst_n_tb = 1'b0 ;
    3002            2                          1     
    3003            1                          1     		#(CLK_PERIOD) i_sclgen_rst_n_tb = 1'b1 ;
    3003            2                          1     
    3004            1                          1     		#(5*CLK_PERIOD) ;
    3005                                             
    3006            1                          1     		system_reset(); 
    3007            1                          1     		i_engine_configuration_tb = 12'd1000 ;
    3008                                             		
    3009            1                          1     		#(5*CLK_PERIOD);
    3010                                             		
    3011                                             
    3012                                             		// initialization of the object 
    3013            1                          1     		conf_obj = new();
    3014                                             
    3015            1                          1     		for (i=0 ; i<100000 ; i++) begin
    3015            2                     100000     
    3016

    3041            1                     100000     			i_engine_en_tb = 1'b1 ;
    3042                                             
    3043            1                     100000     			@(posedge o_engine_done_tb);
    3044            1                     100000     			$display("this is testcase no. %d",i,$time);
    3045            1                     100000     			#(2*CLK_PERIOD) ;
    3046                                             		end	
    3047            1                          1     		$stop ;
    3048                                             	end
    3049                                             
    3050                                             	
    3051                                             
    3052                                             
    3053                                             
    3054                                             
    3055                                             
    3056                                             /*
    3057                                             		// for second preamble and read data 
    3058                                             //////////////////////////////////////////////  Broadcast driver /////////////////////////////////
    3059                                             // backup works 100 % el7amdulelah 
    3060                                             // for second preamble and read data 
    3061                                             int cycle_count ;
    3062                                             		 // Simulation logic to create the desired pattern (Broadcast)
    3063                                                 initial begin	 		
    3064                                                 	for (i=0 ; i<10000 ; i++) begin
    3065                                                 		#(2*CLK_PERIOD); // One clock cycle delay	
    3066                                                 		wait(i_engine_en_tb);
    3067                                                 		@(negedge scl_neg_edge_tb or  negedge scl_pos_edge_tb)
    3068                                                     		// Step 1: Randomize for 44 cycles
    3069                                                     		cycle_count = 37;
    3070                                                     		while (cycle_count > 0) begin
    3071                                                     		    i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = $random();
    3072                                                     		    #(CLK_PERIOD); // One clock cycle delay
    3073                                                     		    cycle_count--;
    3074                                                     		end
    3075                                                     		
    3076                                                     		// Step 2: Hold at zero for 4 cycles
    3077                                                     		i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = 0;
    3078                                                     		repeat (7) begin
    3079                                                     		#(CLK_PERIOD); // One clock cycle delay
    3080                                                     		end
    3081                                                     
    3082                                                     		// Step 3: Randomize for 38 cycles
    3083                                                     		cycle_count = 37;
    3084                                                     		while (cycle_count > 0) begin
    3085                                                     		    i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb =  $random();
    3086                                                     		   	#(CLK_PERIOD); // One clock cycle delay
    3087                                                    		 		cycle_count--;
    3088                                                     		end
    3089                                                     
    3090                                                     		// Step 4: Hold at one for 4 cycles
    3091                                                     		i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = 1;
    3092                                                     		repeat (4) begin
    3093                                                     		    #(CLK_PERIOD); // One clock cycle delay
    3094                                                     		end
    3095                                                     		
    3096                                                     		// Step 5: Randomize until engine_done is set to 1
    3097                                             				i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = $random();
    3098                                             				#(2*CLK_PERIOD); // One clock cycle delay
    3099                                             				wait (o_engine_done_tb) #(2*CLK_PERIOD);
    3100                                             				continue ;
    3101                                             				  
    3102                                                 	end 
    3103                                                 end
    3104                                             */
    3105                                             
    3106                                             /*
    3107                                             
    3108                                             //////////////////////////////////////////////  Direct set driver /////////////////////////////////
    3109                                             
    3110                                             	initial begin 
    3111                                             		forever #(2*CLK_PERIOD) begin  
    3112                                             			@(negedge scl_neg_edge_tb or  negedge scl_pos_edge_tb) i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = 0 ;

    3115                                             
    3116                                             */
    3117                                             
    3118                                             
    3119                                              /*
    3120                                             //////////////////////////////////////////////  Direct Get driver /////////////////////////////////
    3121                                             // backup works 100 % el7amdulelah 
    3122                                             // for second preamble and read data 
    3123                                             int cycle_count ;
    3124                                             		 // Simulation logic to create the desired pattern (Broadcast)
    3125                                                 initial begin	 		
    3126                                                 	for (i=0 ; i<10000 ; i++) begin
    3127                                                 		#(2*CLK_PERIOD); // One clock cycle delay

    3147                                             
    3148                                                     		//CRC Preamble 
    3149                                                     		i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = 1;

    3151                                                     		i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = 0;

    3153                                             
    3154                                                     		// C token 1100

    3156                                                     		#(4*CLK_PERIOD) ;
    3157                                                     		i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = 0;
    3158                                                     		#(4*CLK_PERIOD) ;
    3159                                             
    3160                                             				wait (o_engine_done_tb) #(2*CLK_PERIOD);
    3161                                             				continue ;
    3162                                             				  
    3163                                                 	end 
    3164                                                 end
    3165                                             */
    3166

    3172            2                    9297228     
    3173            1                    9297227     			@(negedge scl_neg_edge_tb or negedge scl_pos_edge_tb) i_sdahnd_rx_sda_tb = $random() ;

    3174                                             		end
    3175                                             	end

    3181                                             	task system_reset ;
    3182                                             		begin

    3184            1                          1     			i_rst_n_tb = 1'b0 ;
    3185            1                          1     			#(CLK_PERIOD) i_rst_n_tb = 1'b1 ;
    3185            2                          1     
    3186                                             		end 
    3187                                             	endtask
    3188

    3190                                             		begin 
    3191            1                     200000     			my_regf_wr_en_tb_selector    = selector ;
    3192            1                     200000     			my_regf_data_wr_tb_selector  = selector ;
    3193            1                     200000     			my_regf_addr_tb_selector     = selector ;
    3194                                             		end
